title: TikTok Shop Product and Creator Tracker

productUrls.title: Product URLs
productUrls.description: Direct TikTok Shop product URLs (best reliability). Example: https://www.tiktok.com/shop/product/1234567890123456789

sellerHandles.title: Seller handles
sellerHandles.description: TikTok seller or creator handles without @. The actor will visit the profile and discover Shop product links.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Search keywords to discover product links. Discovery is best-effort and may vary by region.

categoryUrls.title: Category or listing URLs
categoryUrls.description: TikTok Shop category/listing pages to extract product links from.

region.title: Region
region.description: Region to target. Affects UI, availability, currency, and anti-bot behavior.

slackWebhookUrl.title: Slack webhook URL
slackWebhookUrl.description: Slack incoming webhook for change alerts.

webhookUrl.title: Generic webhook URL
webhookUrl.description: POST JSON alerts here when price or stock changes.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy (recommended) and select appropriate country groups (e.g., US).
